NAEB NATIONAL HDQ,
10-12-53
MEMO*
TO * ALL OFFICERS AND BOARD MEMBERS
FROM* NAEB HDQ.
RE
? MEMBERSHIP OF TWO TV STATIONS
NOTIFICATION OF MEETING IN NORMAN, OKLA.
I-)
Membership applications for the first two TV stations who wish to
join NAEB have been received in the office. We think it would b©
good publicity to have our 101st and 102nd active members to be
these two TV stations.
oval
Would you please indicate by return wire your approval or disap
of—
WBNC-TV, The Consolidated University of North Carolina, ChapdtL Hill, N.C
and
WQED, The Metropclitian Pittsburgh Educational Television Station,
Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
2) In case you have not yet received notification—
There will be an all-day meeting of the officers and board of/directors
at Norman, Oklahoma on October 28, 1953 starting at 10 a.m.
The meeting is called by president Graydon Ausmus.
